title: Create FO-08 discovery agent with hybrid fragment prompt
description:
Create the FO-08 discovery agent with the hybrid fragment generation prompt.

Files to create:
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-08/index.ts`
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-08/agent.ts`

Implementation:
1. Copy `src/mastra/agents/fo-07/agent.ts` as starting point
2. Update agent ID to `fo-08-discovery-agent`
3. Replace DEFAULT_INSTRUCTIONS with the full hybrid fragment prompt from spec (section: Generating Hybrid Fragments — Prompt Section)
4. Include the 5 Dimensions framework from FO-07
5. Update output format to expect 8 `initialFragments` + 15 `expandedFragments`
6. Include `reflectiveStatement` in output format
7. Create index.ts that exports the agent

The DEFAULT_INSTRUCTIONS must include:
- The Hybrid Fragment Principle
- What Makes a Good Hybrid Fragment (with examples)
- Fragment Examples by Dimension (all 5 dimensions)
- Key Rules
- Output Format

Verify by checking the file exists and exports correctly:
```bash
grep -q 'fo-08-discovery' src/mastra/agents/fo-08/agent.ts && echo 'PASS'
```

⚠️ Do not close this tick until the verification passes.
acceptance_criteria: grep -q 'fo-08-discovery' src/mastra/agents/fo-08/agent.ts && grep -q 'initialFragments' src/mastra/agents/fo-08/agent.ts && echo 'PASS' shows PASS
